title: Render selected section text as rich text (no visible HTML tags)

requirements.text: Update only the content rendered at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2] so that, when the underlying string contains HTML (e.g., <b>, <i>, <ul>, <a>), it is displayed as formatted rich text rather than showing the literal HTML tags.

quotes: Render this sections text as formatted rich text instead of showing the HTML tags.

acceptanceCriteria: The UI element at the provided XPath renders basic HTML formatting (bold/italic/underline, lists, links) as rich text.
The UI element at the provided XPath no longer displays literal angle-bracket HTML tags to the user.
Rendered HTML is sanitized using the existing frontend sanitization approach (e.g., frontend/src/utils/safeHtml.ts) so that scripts/event handlers are not executed.
No other sections/elements on the page are changed as part of this request.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the DOM element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2].
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not add new rich-text editing capabilities.
Do not change backend data structures or stored content.
